attributes.action: Deport all non British Citizens who commit a serious offence by British Laws
attributes.background: Deport all non British Citizens who commit a serious offence according to British Laws incurring a sentence of 6 months imprisonment or more, on completion of sentence.

rejection.details:
Foreign national offenders are already deported under the UK Borders Act 2007. So we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You can find out more here:
http://researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/CBP-8062

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
